name: MISONR BCS Section 12 Communication Issues
description: OAS0025 v1.0 Report to show BCS Section 12 answers for the selected establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN COMM_DIFFICULTIES = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN COMM_DIFFICULTIES = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not answered' END END AS V_S12_COMMUNICATION_DIFFICUL32 FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: S12 Communication Issues
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION12.COMM_DIFFICULTIES, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION12.S12_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.RECEPTION_DATE, BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM ASSESSMENT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION12, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID, BCS_PART_STATUS, OFFENDER, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID AND ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_TYPE_ELM = 'TR_BCS') AND (PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PURPOSE) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION12.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (BCS_PART_STATUS.BCS_PART_STATUS_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_STATUS) AND (SUBSTR(OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, 1, 10) = TAGMIS_CASELOAD_SECURITY('VQL10O', OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND ((REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION = 'Complete' AND PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.DESCRIPTION IN ('Basic Custody Screening - Start') AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION IN ('Bedford (HMP)'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT_ID, COMM_DIFFICULTIES, S12_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED, BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, RECEPTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN COMM_DIFFICULTIES = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN COMM_DIFFICULTIES = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not answered' END END AS V_S12_COMMUNICATION_DIFFICUL32 FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID_FOR_FILTER IN (1))

field.name: $ref:V_OFFENDER_SURNAME
field.display: B12.1 Thinking about this interview as a whole in your view is there any evidence of any speech, language or communication difficulties?

field.name: $ref:V_S12_COMMUNICATION_DIFFICUL32
field.display:
B12.2 Are Communication Issues an issue which needs addressing? 
[For the screener to consider]

field.name: $ref:V_S12_ISSUE_TO_BE_ADDRESSED
field.legacySql: =If([S12 Issue To Be Addressed]=0;"No";(If([S12 Issue To Be Addressed]=1;"Yes";"Don't Know")))
